sen.j: 坂上大嬢（おおとものさかのうえのおおいらつめ、生没年不詳）は大伴宿奈麻呂と大伴坂上郎女の長女で、妹に坂上二嬢がいる。
sen.e: OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume (date of birth and death unknown) was the first daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro and OTOMO no Sakanoue no Iratsume, and her younger sister was SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume.
